Translations.Text: O vos believe vos repent DEUS firm repentance. Tuus Dominus tunc remit tuus sins admit vos into gardens flowing streams On ut feria DEUS testimentum non disappoint prophet those believed eum! Their light radiate them ac their statim. They dictus Noster Dominus perfect noster light nos forgive nos; Vos est Omnipotent
O prophet struggle disbelievers hypocrites est stern them. Their abode est Gehenna miserable destiny

DEUS cites examples DE those disbelieved UXOR DE Noah UXOR Lot. They maritus 2 de noster righteous servus they betrayed them consequently they non help them apud totus DEUS! 2 de them told Iniit Hell-fire those deserved it
Ac DEUS cites example de those believed uxor Pharaoh. She dictus My Dominus build domus me Vos in Paradise save me ex Pharaoh his works save me ex transgressing people
Alias Mary Amramite. She maintained eam chastity tunc nos blew eam noster anima She believed in words eam Dominus His scriptures; she est obedient
